full_warning_msg: mypy/plugins/attrs.py:540:8 Incompatible attribute type [8]: Attribute `type` declared in class `mypy.nodes.FuncItem` has type `Optional[mypy.types.FunctionLike]` but is used as type `Type`.
message: Attribute `type` declared in class `mypy.nodes.FuncItem` has type `Optional[mypy.types.FunctionLike]` but is used as type `Type`.
